flawed_nl_solution:
The total marks of science and music are 70+80 = <<70+80=150>>150
When you add the marks she scored in social studies, the full marks become 150+85 = <<150+85=253>>253.
She scored half as many marks in physics as she scored music, totaling 1/2*80 = 40 marks.
When you add the marks she scored in physics to the total marks of the other subjects, the full marks become 253+40 = <<253+40=293>>293
#### 293

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 235, not 253. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
